pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast K-Mer Counting and Clustering for Biological Sequence Analysis // Contains tools for rapidly computing distance matrices and clustering large sequence datasets using fast alignment-free k-mer counting and recursive k-means partitioning. See Vinga and Almeida (2003) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btg005 for a review of k-mer counting methods and applications for biological sequence analysis.
